author: thomasm
msg: JCR-3385 DbClusterTest fails when port is already in use

author: jacopoc
msg: Replaced usage of java.util.Timer with the more modern and reliable ScheduledThreadPool executor.

author: pnoltes
msg: Renamed launcher to celix, libframework to libcelix_framework and libutils to libcelix_utlts.
Adjusted the CMakeLists.txt for the launcer/library renames.
Added a cmake/Bundling.cmake which is can be used instead of Packaging.cmake and creates bundles without the use of CPack.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed Mini-language script file that was pointing to the wrong XSD, reported by Tom on the user mailing list.
